item.description:
I'm going to lead a quick 15 minute Cross-Fit style workout pre-run.

Cross-Fit focuses on high intensity exercise using core muscles under a short duration. Will improve power, strength, and stamina for running, biking, swiming, etc...

Come with a full water bottle and amped to try something new!

I'll start promptly at 9:45 at the playground where we meet for TMIRCE on Saturday Mornings.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Cross-Fit: 15minutes to a Stronger Run
